column1: All right, let's begin the operation!

That was one hell of an entrance, Joker!
They're all riled up!

Just keep at it! Go ham until you've drawn
every last bit of attention!

Everyone else, proceed as planned!
Joker's got the diversion covered,
so now's your time to shine!
Gotcha. Leave the searchlights to us!

And we're to support Oracle as she
hacks the terminal?

Right. Let's secure the area in front
of the gate first.
Yes, yes! Slice 'em and dice 'em!

Mweheheh, the enemy's starting to
swarm Joker... Teach 'em a lesson!

Joker's got the enemy BIG time mad!
Awesome job—just a bit longer!

He's doing it all by himself, too...
Now that's our Joker!

I bet Skull wouldn't pull it off that
smoothly.
The hell's with this déjà vu?
Hmm? Look out, we've got incoming!

Dammit! Fine, let's do this! We'll
take ALL of you on!

Stay sharp, you two! We haven't
fought in some time.

Just warm up a bit for starters. It'll
come back to you soon enough!

Heh, don't forget who you're talkin'
to—this is the offense duty champ!

That's what I like to see, Skull!
We should get in there too!
Joker—use your Persona!
That's it, Joker! Now let's finish them off!
You're done for!

Heh, you AND your shield can say
goodbye!

So it's not just the outfits—we even
got our Personas, huh?

And there's a ton of Shadows here
too... What the hell is this place?
I'm getting a feeling... Is this a...?

Wait, we're trapped!? What do we
do now!?

Who could do this? Well, let's take
these Shadows out and see if it
disappears!

Reinforcements... If this keeps up
much longer, we'll be done for.

We should make good use of our
surroundings. See anything that
could give you the advantage?

Great show, Joker! You really
did 'em in with that one!
My head... is spinnin'...
Skull! Keep it together!
All right! That'll show 'em!

Y'all are WAY too weak! Don't even
try stepping to us again!

Looks like the cage around us
is gone.
Hmm?
Joker! Skull! Watch out!
The hell... Even more of 'em!?

We're getting surrounded fast...
We have to retreat!

Guys—over there! That looks like
our best bet!
Let's move it!

This place is disgusting. Who just
dumps people into garbage like
that?

Let's find a way out as soon as
possible.

We don't know what we'll run into,
either—let's keep an eye on how
we're holding up as we press on.
Where the hell'd they come from!?

Nobody's coming for us if we go
down here. Let's get 'em!
All right, let's be careful.

We'd be fine, but we don't want to
endanger Sophia. Try staying out of
sight.
Wait! A Shadow!
Holy shit! She just beat 'em!
No way... Was that a Persona!?
Who the— What are you doing!?

I am helping the Phantom Thieves.
Don't take it personally.
...In that case, let's get in there too!

Oh, right—keep track of how
you're holding up. Need any
healing items?

Check anything suspicious-looking.
Never know what you might find...

Shadows incoming! A whole load
of 'em... Get ready!

There are more ways to target an
enemy's weakness than skills alone,
remember?

Pow, Shadow down! Nice one. That
kind of shooting'll get you far!
Now's our chance! Wipe 'em out!

Stay on your toes, Joker—they've got
skills just like we do!

Hey Joker, you think you could find
your way up there?

Hmm, they've got numbers on their
side... but not enough to stop us!
Joker, show 'em who's boss!
Ooh! Looking cool, Joker!

Haha, man do you kick ass! I gotta
start catchin' up!

Wait—Shadows ahead! They haven't
spotted us yet.
Should I "wipe them out" for you?

Here's a tip on us Phantom Thieves:
we avoid charging headfirst into
battle whenever possible.
Let's try those stairs for now.
Hey! Who's sneaking around here!?

Looks like we're busted... We can
still use our surroundings to our
advantage, though.

See that hanging there, Joker?
You thinking what I'm thinking?

Great, right where we want 'em!
Now let 'em have it!
Nailed it!
Looking cool, Joker!
All that's left is moppin' up the rest!
Yay, we won.

Don't celebrate just yet... Aren't we
in a dead end?
...There.
If we climb there, we can proceed.
Guess there's no other option...
I've got eyes on them!

They just don't quit! Let's take them
down, Joker!

Ooh, you got another Persona!
Looks like that power you've got
is alive and well!

The enemy became a mask?
Explain this.

He seals a Shadow's form and power
into a mask, turning it into a Persona.
Oh. Interesting.
Enemy ahead!
Joker, try that Persona you just got!

Let's focus on the big Shadow for
now!

How are you holding up? Make sure
you heal yourself when you need it.

This leads further inward. Should we
investigate?
Nah, we should focus on our escape.
Hang on—it looks like this is the exit!

Oh hell yes! Let's get our asses
OUTTA here!

Be careful—they've got serious
numbers.

Don'tcha remember what to do at
times like this?

Watch for an opening, then jump it
from behind! Be careful not to get
spotted!

Now's your chance! Everyone, jump
in and take 'em out!

We did it! That ambush was a real
success.

Indeed. It's been quite some time
since we fought last, but my body
is still ready for more.

They'll go a lot smoother whenever
we ambush them like that, too.

On the other hand, if we're spotted,
they'll get the upper hand against
us. Keep sharp out there.

I guess now we just push forward
and see what we see? Navigator
at the ready!

Hang on there! Searchlights
confirmed!

Getting spotted by one of those'll
mean big trouble—surrounded in
no time.

Shadows are patrolling, too...
No surprise, security is tight here.

A frontal assault sounds like it might
be out of the picture.

Let's see if we have anything else
here...

I said not that way! That's searchlight
territory!
Hey, look! Maybe we can get in there.

Great! If we run along there, getting
in the castle should be a cinch.

But there are more searchlights.
How will we get past?

They're smaller than the other ones,
why don't we just try sneakin' past?
Wha— Holy shit!

We can't go any further! They're
firing on anything within range.

Oracle, can you find a way to shut
them down?
Just a sec... Analyzing...
Yesss! Got it!

The searchlights' power source is
south of here!
South... Yeah, which way's that?

In reality, it'd be somewhere around
Maruku City. Must be some sorta
facility providing power over there.

All right, off to Maruku City! Let's
move out.

The Jail looks like Shibuya, but the
layout isn't exactly the same... I'm
worried we'll get ourselves lost.

Yeah, you should keep tabs on your
location or that'll probably happen!

Maruku City's straight ahead from
here. I'll highlight it on your map.
Wait—sentry!
It has some kind of light, too...

Oh great. Once that thing sees us,
Shadows are just gonna start
pourin' in.

We should avoid all head-on conflict
when possible. Life only gets harder
when they're on high alert.

And if we're spotted too many times,
we'll have no choice but to come
back later.

Let's look for an alternate route—
maybe one where we can stay
unseen.
There's a sentry here as well.

Guess we just hafta take that one
out...

It looks like it hasn't noticed us yet,
though.

Joker, think you could pull off an
ambush from over there?
Nice move, Joker!
Well done.

Taking down enemies doesn't get
any easier than an ambush!
Oh! A treasure chest!

Shit yeah! Let's stomp those guys
and loot that thing!

Wait! That treasure chest has a
security system!

If the security level here gets too
high, the chest is shielded until
things quiet back down again.

If enemies spot us too many times,
no treasure for us. Got it.
Damn, they saw us!
Oh, the treasure chest...
Yes! It's all ours!

Wave of Shadows incoming!
They're weak to [1B]M0~4~Electricity
and [1B]M0~2~Fire!

Can't strike their weakness? Try a
Baton Pass!

That takes care of that. Let's get
going.
Stoooooop! Maruku City's right here.
You mean on the other side of that?

I don't see a way to open the gate,
either. Looks like we need an
alternative.

Such as? I don't think we'll be able
to climb that.

Look over there—what if we tried
going up that way?

At the very least, we might spot
a way around this from up there.
Good idea. Let's hop on up.

Heeey, that's the wrong way!
Look at your objective markerrr!

Waugh, this is tight...! Think we can
really make it?

Whoooa! Look at that god-tier
balance!
One moment. Something is nearby.
Something? What kinda something?

It is a... space. Connected to...
somewhere.
Hmmm!? Hey, Sophie! You're right!

It's like the space here is being
warped... and connected to... the
Crossing?

As in, the Crossing where we first
entered the Jail?

Sooo, if we use this, we'll go back to
the entrance?

Sounds like moving between the Jail
and the real world will make our
resupply efforts at least a bit easier.

That's it: I'm callin' this a checkpoint!
Go ahead and give it a spin so the
location data registers.

Oh? Do you intend to skip the
checkpoint?

It looks like this tunnel eventually
leads right under Maruku City.

Tunnel? Looks more like a sewer to
me. And there's no easy way to get
to the other side...
Welp, looks like we're swimmin'.

No, no, no. I am NOT swimming
in THAT. Not happening!

I would prefer not to as well... Can't
we search for another way?
...Hey, check out the grate.

What do you think—could we use
that to get around?
Yeah, it's worth a try!

Gah, it's too cramped in here! I keep
runnin' into Panther's boots.

Run into anything else back there
and I'll show you how much damage
these boots can really do.
*gasp* No, please don't. For real.

Hey, we came out right where we
wanted! I knew that was the right
move!

We should be able to traverse this
using the pipes.
Neat. Very thiefy.

We ARE the Phantom Thieves, ya
know! You'll get it soon enough!
I'll bet that leads to the surface.
Who the hell are you!?
Waugh! Busted!

Can't have these guys raise a fuss
about us. Get rid of 'em, quick!

All good? Then out of the "tunnel"
we go!

Heeey, we're just on the other side
of the wall! Well done, Thieves!

Great! Now the tower itself is all
that's left!

Lift those knees up. One two,
one two!
Oh yeah, made it!
All right, let's check out that light!

I wonder if the other cores are in jail-
cell-covered towers like this one...

Some form of shorthand reference
would be more convenient. How
does "Incarceration Zone" sound?

In-cars-or... what? Dude, why the
hell would we call it that?

These places are for protecting the
Jail's power sources, so... how about
"Prison Keeps"?

This is where Miyamae Park is
in the real world.
Is that our current destination?
Well, that didn't take long.

This one doesn't appear any easier
to breach, though.

Looks like we're taking the long way
'round.

Security is gonna be tight—let's stay
sharp.
Who's there!?

Uh-oh, busted! Take 'em out before
they call for backup!

Hey, check out the skateboard! Feel
like shredding some Shadows?

Ooh, good call, Skull! I bet you
could mow down a whole gang
of Shadows if you did it right!

This gate's closed too. Maybe there's
another way in somewhere over
there?
I can't see an entrance...

Maybe we should gain some
elevation?
That spot seems rather odd...

Maybe we'll find something useful
there. C'mon, let's check it out!

Nice work! Now, to infiltrate the
Keep!

Aw, another locked door?
And we'd made it so far...

Hold up! I think I might be able to
hack this.
Ooh, for real!?

Let's check out the terminal—at the
very least, I can give it a shot.

Uh-huh, uh-huh... Great, I should
be able to work with this!

Okay, Oracle, we'll leave the door
to you.
Time to get crackin'! Aaaaand, go!

Whoa, whoa! Where'd all these
Shadows come from!?

Uh-oh, busted! Keep 'em off of me,
guys!
Everyone—protect Oracle!
Oracle! Report!
Almost there! Just a little bit longer!

The Shadows are givin' me guff!
Somebody, help!
This is not looking good... Heeelp!
Yes, I did it!

That really freaked me out for a bit
there... Thanks for having my back.

It seems any hacking attempts here
are met with reinforcements.

Let's make sure Oracle's as prepared
as possible from here on out.
Wait—incoming Shadows!

How'd you get in here!? Where are
the guards!?

In Her Majesty's name, you shall go
no further!
Watch out! That one's extra tough!

It's gotta have an opening
somewhere! Watch its
movements!
Ohhh, you guys rule!

Now it's just a climb to the top.
Full steam ahead!
This core is Alice on a... book?

She made the cover of UN UN?
That's a really famous magazine.

A widely recognized symbol of
power. Mona's theory is being
proven with each turn.

She would've been famous even if
she hadn't started doing all this...
Panther...

Then what reason did she have?
Does she even have one at all?

Whatever the case, the next core's
the last one.

It's just a bit west of here! Over by
Bunkamachi.

Bunkamachi? That's quite the
cultural hotspot.

Returning to Shibuya Crossing and
using Central Street would probably
be quickest.

Once you get past Central Street,
you'll be at Bunkamachi.

Bunkamachi is home to a large
ballet hall as well.

Ballet? Oh, I got it—where wealthy
people have others park their own
vehicles for them.
...That would be valet.

Hey Noir, didn't you say you used
to do valet— I mean, ballet?

Yes, I was in a few recitals...
I still use valet service, though.

How incredible. I would appreciate
witnessing your valet skills in action.

You do know the ballet's what's more
impressive, right?

Ah, this looks like something for me
to get my paws on.

Best of luck, Oracle—we'll have your
back from here.
Yes, hacking complete! Moving on...
Huh? What's that for?

Hmm, looks like some kinda
generator.
Let there be light!
...No result. Could it be broken?
No, it's feeding power somewhere...

Eh, why don't we just leave it for
now? We've got other shit to do.

Look, it's another one of those
machines. I wonder what purpose
they serve...

Will you switch it on, Joker? Or will
you leave it be?
Ummm... Did that do something?
Hellooooo?
Frickin' nothing, that's what it did!

No point hangin' around here. Let's
move on, Joker.
Oh, a third generator.

What now, Joker? Plan on switching
it on?
Nothing yet again?

Oh? I think something's been turned
on!
So, third time was the charm, was it?

Looks like the power is running
up ahead of us. Let's check it out!

Hey, isn't this like one of the other
terminals you've been hacking,
Oracle?

Sounds like we need you for this one
too. Think you can do it?

Hmm, the screen's not on. I don't
think it's powered up.

It can't be hacked? But, we have
nowhere else to go.

Oh, right! I think I remember
spotting some huge machine
on Central Street.

Maybe that's this terminal's power
source?

I believe that's our only lead for now.
Let's return to Central Street.

Hey, ain't this another one o' them
terminals Oracle's been hacking?

This one's screen is blank, though.
Could it be turned off?

We powered something earlier.
Was it not this terminal?

No, that went here—it's just not
enough juice.

Based on the power consumption,
I'd say this thing uses three separate
sources.

THREE power sources!? The electric
bill for this terminal alone must be
horrifying...

There have to be more of those
generators somewhere nearby. Let's
go back to Central Street and look.

Hmm... Looks like all the power from
those generators we turned on is
ending here.

Oh hey, it's another one of those
terminals you've been hacking,
Oracle.

Huh? It took three whole generators
to power this one lil' thing?

I know what you mean, that seems
rather wasteful. Perhaps something
else beyond here is also powered up.

Well, I'm still glad we were able to
find them all.

Indeed—otherwise, we would've had
to turn back.

Your instincts continue to serve you
well, Joker.

All right then! Good luck with the
hacking, Oracle!

Hey! Isn't that one of those power
generators?

Good thing we found it. Shall we
switch it on now?

Do you think this properly powered
the terminal?
Uhhh... this isn't gonna cut it.

Considering the output levels I'm
seeing here, we're gonna need to
turn on two more.

What!? How much power's that
thing use!?

Looks like we have to poke around
and find some more generators.

Power source sighted. We should
turn it on.
That's the second generator so far.

Just one more to go, right? Let's
keep it up!
There's a generator!

We've activated three generators.
Is that sufficient, Oracle?

Yep, we have the power! Let's get
back to that terminal!

The terminal really is on now, thank
goodness.
Finally we can get going—

Not just yet. Oracle still has to hack
into it.

Welp, it's hacking time! Ready to
watch my back?

Mission complete! We've nearly
reached Bunkamachi.
So, this is the final Prison Keep.

The walls're just as high as the
others...

I suspect the gate is closed just as
with the others. How will we
breach the keep?

Perhaps we can leap over there from
another rooftop? Let's try gaining
some elevation.

This appears to be the main
entrance.
Locked—no surprise there...

Nope. I guess we'll have to drop in
from above, huh?
Whoa, check the view!

This offers a pretty good view of the
area.
Now, to find a point of entry...
Hey! There!

That string of flags leads all the way
to the Keep. Think we could slide
down it to get over there?

Hmmm, it doesn't look taut enough
for us to use like that.

What if we gave the Ferris wheel
a spin? Would that tighten it up?

You know, that could work. Let's
head over there and check it out.

Who are you? What are you doing
here!?
Aw crap, we're busted!

Careful! That one's stronger than the
others!

This must be the terminal for the
Ferris wheel. Can you power it up,
Oracle?

We don't have to go huntin' for more
generators, do we?

Nope, looks like we're good here.
It's already juiced up for us!

Perhaps the Ferris wheel's connected
to the same generators?
Aaallriiight! Ferris wheel: activate!
Oooh.
You did it!
Now we can enter the Prison Keep.
Yes! Time for our grand entrance!
Wha— What are you doing here!?

We've come to relieve you of your
duties!
Take him down and the core is ours!
Yes! Mission complete!
So the last core is... a CD?

Oh, I recognize that album. Its songs
are in a lot of commercials nowadays.

That's Alice's biggest album, the one
that's been at the top of the charts
for weeks now...

So, 'zat mean it's a scam? Did she
only blow up 'cause she changed
so many hearts?

That should be the last of the Jail's
power sources.

Correct—the searchlights should
be deactivated now.

Finally, we can enter Alice's castle.
Shall we?

Yes. We need to stop her as soon as
possible.

Let's return to the Crossing so we can
head to the castle!
Sitrep, everyone!

We're at the searchlights—just
waitin' on the signal!
No Shadows in sight on our end.

Looks like the diversion is working,
all thanks to Joker!
It's all up to you now, Oracle.

I've got this. Mona, take over
navigation for me!
Gotcha! Good luck hacking!
Joker, more Shadows incoming!
Watch out, reinforcements are here!
How's that wall comin'? Ya done yet?
Hang on! I'm working on it!

All these Shadows flooding the
Shibuya streets... That's certainly
no everyday sight.

Now I'm imagining it happening in
the real world... Scary.
Aaaaaaaaaand, as the cherry on top:

Mweheheh... Enjoy your Oracle
Virus Parfait, chumps!
Thank goodness we made it in time!
That couldn'ta gone better, Joker!
Now the real fight begins!

Let's mop up the rest of these Shadows
so we can get to 705!

Enemy Shadows defeated! Nice,
now nothing stands in our way!

I've returned from my diversion.
The plan appears to have been a
success.

Hey, great hustle out there, Sophie!
Now all we hafta do is storm the
castle!
Nooo! Not that way!
The searchlights are off now!

Looks like the plan worked. Time to
breach the enemy stronghold.

I'm picking up some Shadows...
Looks like a few guards stuck
around.

Add 'em to the KO count so we can
move on!

The searchlights in the area ahead
are still active.

Those'll be a breeze for Joker. He can
slip right past 'em!

So you're the ones defiling this
kingdom...

You will go no further. Once you are
dead, Her Majesty can be at ease!
This one's tough! Careful, guys!
All Shadows defeated!

The barrier's down, too—let's move
out while we still can!
All right! We're in!

I'm picking up that Treasure-like
smell right above us, in the throne
room. Let's go!
Oof, it's locked...

Try finding a mechanism somewhere
here.

We've found the intruders!
Capture them!
Shoot! Incoming!
How the heck did we get caught?

It must have something to do with
the switches in the busts... Maybe
there's a correct order?

Try focusing—look for any sort of
clue how to approach this.

Hey, that did it! Good sleuthing,
Joker.
Let's get on up.
Oh... The stairwell...
This is quite the climb...

If this is anything like the 705 in the
real world, there'll be an elevator
somewhere.
Maybe check for one here too?
Intruders! Get them!

How dare you filth defy Her
Majesty!?
Incoming! We're surrounded!

What the hell? How'd we get
jumped!?
Ugh, they don't give up!

The elevator's on its way! Just hang
in there!
All right! Now take the elevator!
More Shadows? But how!?
There's no escape!

We've found the intruders! Call for
backup!
We made it! Hurry, get out!

That was a pretty rough ride!
Everyone holding up?

They really aren't messing around
with us anymore.

We've gone quite a ways up
already—how much further
to the top?

There should be a stairwell on
the other side of that door...

Invasive filth! You'll never reach the
royal hall!

The cost of defying Her Majesty is
your heads!

Incoming! The exploring can wait
until we know it's safe!

They've got serious numbers...
Wanna try out that party popper?
Finally, it's over...
Hell yeah! Let's keep on rollin'!

Aw, what!? Now THIS door won't
open!
But this door leads to the stairwell...
Hmm?

Maybe we should check outside?
Could be worthwhile.
Oh! How about THIS way?
Let's see where they take us.
So, they escaped, did they?
Joker! The window!

Aaagh! Please forgive me, Your
Majesty!

I TOLD you to capture them...
Do you require punishment?
Yeeeeek!

Ugh, wouldn't want to be on the receiving end
of that...
Oh, now you pity whoever's gettin' whipped...

That Treasure-like smell isn't far now.
Let's get to the roof.

Can't you get it through your thick
skull? No one wants you around.

Oh, shit! What the hell is goin' on!?
This thing just flipped out outta
nowhere!

The room's also changed. Are these...
prison cells?
No time—here it comes!
Look sharp, folks!

Aren't you supposed to be all down
in the dumps? What're you doing
batting your lashes at some guy?
What is WITH this thing!?

I don't know, but... whatever that
thing is, it's horrible!

What the hell's up with this room,
too!? Ain't it supposed to have the
birdcage key in it? Not THIS!?

The key is most assuredly here.
It must be hidden somewhere
within the cell.

We're not exactly fit to search for it
now—focus on the enemy first!

Huh? Oh, you're here? You're so
bland I didn't even notice you,
hahaha!

Is this stuff... from Alice's past? Did
she really go through all this?

There were some truly terrible things
said in the classroom as well...

I believe we've seen why Alice strove
so far to wipe the records of her time
at school...

We should avoid wasting energy on
our attacks. Let's read the enemy's
movements and respond in kind!
I lost the reading! Where'd it go!?

This thing can teleport!? Watch out
for sneak attacks, everyone!

Your face really pisses me off. Why
won't you just go off and die for us
already?

Those wind-up attacks look like
they'll really hurt! Better stay
sharp!

Ahahah, that's so good! You think a
guy would actually be into someone
like YOU? Get real!

Whoa! This thing's really puttin' up
a fight!

Don't get too close! Keep a safe
distance!
*gasp* Look out!

It's warpin' all over the place now!
Quit cheatin', dammit!

I heard you actually confessed your
feelings to him? Gross. SO FUCKING
GROSS!

Are you just, like, obsessed with guys
now or something? It's not like you'd
ever make a good couple.

In fact, I think I'll take him off your
hands for you! Ahahahahaha!

"Take him"? So, all of this bullying
was over some affairs of the heart.

What a bunch of bullies! They were
just too mean to Alice!

The enemy's getting weaker! Put that
bully in its place!
Hell yeah! That did it!
Hang on—something's up...

Look! The chain goes all the way to
the top!

Perhaps it fell when we opened the
lock.

Climbing this should give us a straight
shot to the birdcage of Desires.

We'll enter through here after we
send the calling card.

What in the... She turned into some
kinda rabbit!
So this really is Alice in Wonderland...

Oh my, I'm late for a very important
date.

Come along, come along! I have such
wonders to show you!
What wonders?

Ignore her, Sophie. She just wants to
torture us or something.

Alice... I'm gonna make you see the
light!

Aw, you Phantom Thieves seem like
